item.title: The HTC Desire 510 provides budget-friendly LTE capabilities
item.description: HTC’s most budget-friendly LTE smartphone is hitting the shelves just days after the company launched the Desire 210 in Singapore. Starting September 6, 2014, you can find the HTC Desire 510 at mobile carriers and major retailers across Singapore. This device boasts a quad-core LTE processor, a 4.7‚Äù display, and runs on Android 4.4. Source: HTC. “While the industry has been buzzing about the impact of 4G, it’s easy to overlook that only a handful of high-end devices truly utilize this technology,” says HTC CEO, Peter Chou.
